name: HCESCedBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: From Hamilton County ESC in Cincinnati, Ohio. Alexa will read area school related news and other pertinent education related information and updates. Updated Monday through Friday.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
